description:
Play as Bob the Slime, while you try to defeat elemental enemies! 

When the elemental enemies die, they drop elementals orbs based on thrown elements. These can be absorbed in order to gain their abilities. Defeat enemies and collect their powers to become the most powerful Slime in the world!

Developed in seven weeks by first year game programmers and artists at Yrgo.

The Elemental Hierarchy and controls can both be found in-game, but to sum it up:

Fire; Does 2x damage to Earth, Takes 2x Damage from Earth.

Earth; Does 2x damage to Wind, Takes 2x Damage from Wind.

Wind; Does 2x damage to Water, Takes 2x damage from Water.

Water; Does 2x damage to Fire, Takes 2x damage from Wind.

- Picking up elemental orbs of a fully charged ability will heal the player.

You change your element with the keys; 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5. 

Upon pressing 5,  you will be switched back to your ''default'' mode, in which you deal 1x damage to all enemies.

- Your Abilities change depending on what element you've switched to.

Earth: Slam(AOE) | Wind: Dash | Water: Water ray | Fire: Flamethrower(AOE)
